description: This room is the entrance way to the Sanitarium Lounge.  Unlike
most lounges, this one is well lit, so as to allow the elderly to find
their way without tripping over themselves.  A waitress is wandering
around, helping people with drink orders, and a bar can be seen far to
the east.
55420.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: The hallway is poorly lit, just barely illuminating the ancienct
pictures of the once great warriors, now wrinkled with age.  Liquids
of unknown origin flow on the floor, stinking horribly.
55404.name: {*H{Wal{wl{Wwa{*y{x

description: The pidgeons are sitting here, prepared for a meal of bread crumbs
tossed to them by all the old folks.  Empty bags have been left all
over the place, showing that this is the place to be to feed the
birds.
55430.name: The Roof

description: A small secluded alcove is here, offering a peaceful, almost
romantic place to come and rest.  The smell of urine and moth balls is
almost none existant over here, replaced by the smell of tons of
candles and dirty table clothes.
55424.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: More convinient portals for the weak and the elderly.
{W[{YDown{W]{C - ZoZo City
{W[{YUp{W]{C - Hell
{W[{YPortal{W]{C - House of the Moon{x
55444.name: {WIn{wst{Want {WTr{wav{Wel{wli{Wng{x

description: Convinient portals for the weak and the elderly.
{W[{YNorth{W]{C - {xBrewery, for all your drinking needs.
{W[{YDown{W]{C - {xMarket Square
{W[{YUp{W]{C - {xMuseum Hallway
{W[{YSouth{W]{C - {xDrakyri Island
{W[{YEast{W]{C - {xMore portals
{W[{YPortal{W]{C - {xCuration for the needy - Temple of the Morning Lord
55407.name: {wIn{Wst{want {wTr{Wav{wel{Wli{wng{x

description: The steps of the staircase are slippery from the
grime that covers them. The fact that they're made
of fine marble is barely defined. The stairs lead down
into the basement and up to the shopping area and
the roof.
55411.name: {*St{Wai{wr{Wca{*se{x

description: If you're not with me, you're against me.
Stay out.
up - harpers
down - rtpk 2nd floor
south - flame town hall
north - MY OFFICE
55498.name: Mobprog testing room

description: A small secluded alcove is here, offering a peaceful, almost
romantic place to come and rest.  The smell of urine and moth balls is
almost none existant over here, replaced by the smell of tons of
candles and dirty table clothes.
55423.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: Piles of wheels, nuts and bolts are scattered all
over the room, a small dwarf stands helplessly inmidst
of it all, trying to put together wheelchairs for
the old people.
55417.name: {gWh{Ye{gelcha{Yi{gr {CS{*hack{x

description: This not so quiet and romantic alcove is right next to the jukebox,
which is blaring old music.  People are laying around, asleep from
either the crappy music, or crappy drinks...
55422.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: Slick with dirt and grim, these steps are far from stabile.  Their
fine marble is hidden by the ages and ages of crap all over them.  The
sounds of water dripping is everywhere, accompanied by the smell of
mold and mildew.
55408.name: {*The {RB{ras{*em{ren{Rt{x

description: The stairs, while made of a fine white marble, are completely
covered in grim and filth.  Going up leads up to the roof, while going
down leads to the main floor.
55412.name: {*St{Wai{wr{Wca{*se{x

description: A long bar table stretches at the west wall.  A busy tavernkeeper
walks around polishing glasses, mixing drinks and having an occasional
chatter with a customer.  Behind the tavernkeeper stand shelves filled
with miriads of different bottles of drinks from all over Abeir-Toril.
Soothing nice music can be heard from the east where bards, minstrels
and singers gather to entertain the tavernfolk and themselves with
brew and song.
55439.name: The {w"{YD{ye{Ys{ye{Yrt {BR{Ca{bi{Bn{w"{B Tavern{w

description: The center of the roof is predominately filled up with a massive
statue of a Penguin. The whimpers and complaining of old people can
be heard from all around, almost as if the halls themselves were
complaining about the food being too cold and the sheets being too
hard.
55428.name: Center of the roof

description: The hallway leads to a staircase to the west and
continues east. The RTPK cafeteria is to the south
and the magic shop can be found to the north.
55414.name: {*H{Wal{wl{Wwa{*y{x

description: The roof offers a few of the mountains all around, almost like
walls, keeping the old people locked inside.  Down on the ground below
are a cluster of old people, all rambling at the same time about how
good they were at killing when they were younger.  The roof itself is
pretty empty, except for a lounge chair, and the sobs of the elderly
down below.
55431.name: The Roof

description: In a small corner of the basement, a wise old man is meditating.
Obviously here to help, he does not seem to notice the water dripping
slowly down the wall behind him, or the rats scurrying away into the
darkness.
55410.name: {RC{ro{*m{rba{Rt {*Ro{Wo{*m{x

description: This part of the lounge is taken over mostly by the giant table in
the middle.  It is well lit, stinks of old people, and has a gay
waiter wandering around.  Looks like a fun place to be!
55421.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: A large table takes up this room, offering a place to sit and eat
the cold gruel.  A rail is set along the far wall, in front of the
counter, where the elderly get to pick which color gruel they want
today.
55413.name: {MC{*af{We{wt{We{*ri{Ma{x

description: The chapel is rather small, yet the perish is no bigger.
A donation pit sits right by the entrance, rows of uncomfortable
wooden pews stand all the way up to the altar. A bored priest
with a hangover is making a vain attempt to have a decent service.
55402.name: {WFo{*rg{Wot{*te{Wn {WC{*ha{Wpe{*l{x

description: Bloodstains on the walls, unsterilised scalpels scattered all over,
dirty floor. Although the cots look clean enough, the appearance of
the doctor isn't too assuring, he looks more like a butcher.
55403.name: {wE{Rm{wergen{Rc{wy {wR{Ro{wom

description: The bar is unusually quiet, save for the faint music
coming from the east. No wonder, most visitors are either
sleeping or passed out from the {-o{-d{-d{x drinks.
55425.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: A quaint white picket fence surrounds the neatly mown
lawn. The building of despair and old people stands to
the south. Welcome to the Retirement Home!
55433.name: Path to the retirement home

description: If you want to redeem your tainted soul
and live a better life, free from the
sins of the last one, state your wish to
be redeemed and it shall be done with utmost
care and precision.
Rows of pews line this room, offering a place for silent
contemplation and prayer.  Even though they are old, these people
still do like the immortals.
A [{CS{*ign{x] is hanging on the wall.
55406.name: {YC{Wh{wap{We{Yl {xof {YRe{Wde{wmp{Wti{Yon{x

description: Pictures of ancient battles line this part of the hallway, acting
as a shrine to glory once held by the rickety old people living here.
Trying to relive past glories, they love to ramble on and on about
these pictures, often to an audience that includes pidgeons and their
own drool.
55405.name: {*H{Wal{wl{Wwa{*y{x

description: The small shops looks stuffed with potions, scrolls,
wands and all that paraphanelia of magic. A bird (*gasp!*)
stands behind the counter, peering around, waiting for
you to buy something.
55419.name: {RM{ra{Yg{ri{Rc {*S{wh{Wo{*p{x

description: A lounge chair has been left up here on the roof, overlooking the
front lawn.  Nothing of interest is up here, except for some pidgeons.
However, just get a bag of bread and that can entertain these people
for days.
55429.name: The Roof

description: Along the wall in this room is a massive bar, lined with an
assortment of weird drinks and strange alcohols.  Giant, extra soft
chairs run along the bar, offering the old people a nice secure seat
while they enjoy their laxatives and other fine beverages.  The smell
of urine and moth balls permiates the entire room.
55426.name: Retirement Home Bar

description: A smith stands here, selling his wares and
occasionally pounding away with his hammer on the
{*mithril{x anvil.
55416.name: Smithy

description: A huge golem is here, shackled up so it can't harm anyone.
You get the urge to hack into the impenetrable being, knowing
it won't strike back.
55409.name: {RP{rra{*ct{ric{Re{x {RR{ro{*o{Rm{x

description: Standing at the doors of the tavern, music, voices and singing can
be heard from the inside.  A tantalazing smell of fine beverages
surrounds and envelops, beckoning the thirsty and tired adventurer to
rest inside and have a flagon or two of some fine brew while inside.
A simple oak door leads inside.
55434.name: Entrance to the {w"{YD{ye{Ys{ye{Yrt {BR{Ca{bi{Bn{w"

description: The whole area smells of old people and medicine. An old man
can be seen shivering in the corner, begging for nurses to
give him more morphine. Organ music can be heard from the east
and shreaks of pain from the west.
55401.name: {*L{Wo{xun{Wg{*e{x

description: This is the checkin desk for the Old Folks Home.  A large desk
spans most of the room, with a small pad to sign in on.  The smell of
moth balls and old people is strong...  And it gets stronger further
in.
... Welcome Home ...
55400.name: {*Ch{Wec{xk-I{Wn De{*sk{x

description: The smithy to the north, wheelchair shop to the south
large wooden dooors with "Sanitarium" carved on them can
be seen on the eastern end of the hallway.
55415.name: {*H{Wal{wl{Wwa{*y{x

description: You stand on the top of the grimy staircase
overlooking the roof of the retirement home. Chairs
stand scattered here and there, flocks of pigeons
roam the surroundings.
55427.name: The Roof

description: Scrolls with beautiful women scorched on them lie
around in piles, packs of condoms are scaterred here
and there. A sloberly man stands in the midst of it
all chewing and spitting tobacco, checking out the
most recent erotic scroll issue.
55432.name: {WT{whe {RS{rmu{Rt {WH{wut

description:
A sloppy-looking nurse in a dirty white coat
walks around the retirement home cleaning up and
half-arsedly taking care of the old folk.
55400.room_name: A nurse walks around with bed pans and pills for the old folk
55400.name: a nurse~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
The aura in the room floats peacefully...waiting for you
to ask it to redeem your soul and move on.
55401.room_name: An aura floats here, waiting to redeem your soul
55401.name: Sweet Redemption~
subroutines:
F par ABCDEFGHI
M SPEECH 55406 redeem my soul~

55402.d_flags: D Yells {Y'{WSweet death...ye have come for me!{Y'{x~
description: This man is almost dead.. yet he lives. Probably worse for him.
55402.room_name: A frail old man lies in the corner cringing from the pain
55402.name: a demented old man~
55402.t_flags: T Say Please! Give me some more morphine! I beg of you!~

description:
This old and seasoned man seems to be untouched
by his tremendous age. His wrinkled face still bears
the marks of previous battles and excercises. Well
trained muscles haven't gotten limp in time. The
Guildmaster is in excellent shape and state of mind, 
retired from battles he now stands here, teaching old
people self defence and other nifty tricks.
55403.room_name: The guildmaster is here, teaching the retired people some self-defense
55403.name: The Guildmaster~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
A huge goldem made from a solid slab of highly
durable adamantine stands here, shackled to the wall,
surrounded by old farts who poke him with sticks and
canes, not fearing that the shackled monstrosity would
escape.
55404.room_name: An {Wa{Cd{Wa{Cm{Wa{Cn{Wt{Ci{Wn{Ce {*golem{x is shackled up here, ready to be beaten at
55404.name: an adamantine golem~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

55405.room_name: Doctor Rawlings stands here with a sinister look
55405.name: doctor Rawlings~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 55400 50~

description:
The cook busily walks around the pots and
pans, cooking up gruels and foods for the
old people. He looks you over and tells you
to mind your own business.
55406.room_name: A cook stands here over a burning stove
55406.name: a cook~
subroutines:
F for HMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
A short dwarf is here, putting together wheelchairs for 
the retired folk. No wonder the production's low quality - 
he's almost blind!
55407.room_name: Grez the dwarven mechanic stands here trying to assemble a wheelchair
55407.name: Grez~

description:
The priest hiccups and burps on occasion
but overall handles his job nice, save for
falling over during a service.
55408.room_name: A priest looks drunk, but seems to like his job
55408.name: a drunken priest~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
55408.t_flags: T Blah-blah *hic* jesus will save ye...yadda-yadda *burp*~

description:
The contraption seems to be falling apart, yet
by some miracle still keeps rolling around, quite
able to support the olde farts riding it.
55409.name: a {*ri{Wcke{*ty {gwooden{x wheelchair~
subroutines:
F aff JT
F res BH
F vul FI
F for AHZ
F par ACDEFGHIJKPQUVX

description:
You see something special about the smith...
oh wait...nothing.
55410.room_name: A smith stands here and occasionally forges a thing or two
55410.name: the smith~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description: {YFluffy!{x
55411.room_name: Peedy the magic bird stands here, trying to sell his "magic"
55411.name: Peedy the magic bird~

description:
The guy obviosly looks bored to death. His only
pastime is mixing weird drinker in dirty glasses
to old retired drunkards.
55412.room_name: Bartender {CSkyclad{x stands here, polishing glasses and mixing {-o{-d{-d{x drinks
55412.name: The Bartender~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

55413.room_name: A waitress stands here, wearing a mini-skirt...wait...it's a man!
55413.name: a gay waitress~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description: The stripper dances seductively and winks at you.
55414.room_name: A stripper dressed in {*black {Wla{*t{Wex{x is here, dancing for old wankers
55414.name: a stripper~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

55415.room_name: A flock of pigeons flies around the roof, picking up bread crums and amusing the old people
55415.name: a flock of pigeons~

55416.room_name: Slackjaw Jockol stands here, selling stuff with adult content
55416.name: Slackjaw Jockol~

55417.room_name: (Wizi) The RTPK Basement Trap is here.
55417.name: Basement Trap~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 55407 7~

description:
Boo!
Mob has 5k plat meant as a plat resource for Pingu
55418.name: Shmee~
subroutines:
M GRALL 55488 100~
M SPEECH 55499 song~
M DELAY 55498 100~

55497.room_name: Sheet...that's one illegal cloak lying there
55497.name: Pingu's Cloak~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description: modderfokker
55432.name: number mob~
